name: Flower Gift
short-desc: Increases friendly Pokemon's Attack and Special Defense to 1.5% during strong sunlight.
long-desc: Friendly Pokemon have 1.5% their Attack and Special Defense during strong sunlight if any friendly Pokemon has this ability.  Unlike , , and , this ability is not tied to its Pokemon's form change;  will switch between its forms even if it loses this ability.  As such, this ability also works if obtained by a Pokemon other than Cherrim.
